lines.i: Information on one or more risk factors of the mother during pregnancy.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.44"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:244)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:247)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:245)/@code="73775-9" Risk factors in this pregnancy (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:472)
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - the nature of the risk factor about which information is provided.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:248), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet STATIC (CONF:473)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:249)
If a risk factor of previous Cesarean delivery is recorded, the number of previous Cesarian deliveries should be noted.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:250)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:251)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:252)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:253)/@code="68497-7" Previous cesarean deliveries (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:474)
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - the number of previous Cesarean deliveries.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:254)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="INT" (CONF:255)
The number of previous Cesarean deliveries.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:244)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:247)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:245)/@code="73775-9" Risk factors in this pregnancy (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:472)
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - the nature of the risk factor about which information is provided.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:248), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet STATIC (CONF:473)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:249)
If a risk factor of previous Cesarean delivery is recorded, the number of previous Cesarian deliveries should be noted.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:250)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:251)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:252)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:253)/@code="68497-7" Previous cesarean deliveries (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:474)
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - the number of previous Cesarean deliveries.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:254)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="INT" (CONF:255)
The number of previous Cesarean deliveries.
